text: Kkes ed wid iusan ar ugdud ukud tesâam laâqed, ne$ i kwen id iusan, gguman wulawen nnsen a kwen nna$en, ne$ ad nna$en agdud nnsen. Lemmer i S ihwi i Öebbi, yili Ifka yasen adabu fellawen, a kwen nna$en. Ma âazlen iman nnsen segwen, ur kwen nnu$en, ssutren awen d tifrat, ur kwen Ippawi Öebbi $uôsen.
